question: 田舎
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>rice paddy</kanji> and a <kanji>cottage</kanji>. This is the image of the <vocabulary>countryside</vocabulary> to me. This is <vocabulary>rural</vocabulary>. Just cottages and rice paddies...
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading doesn't really make sense for the kanji, and is an exception for sure. Just think about how when you're in the <vocabulary>countryside</vocabulary> you're <reading>in <ja>中</ja></reading> (<ja>いなか</ja>) of nowhere.
